member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetCurrentStoryboard
member.summary: Gets the active storyboard for the animation variable.
member.param: The active storyboard, or NULL if the animation variable is not being animated.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetCurve
member.summary: Gets the animation curve of the animation variable.
member.param: The object that generates a sequence of animation curve primitives.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetDimension
member.summary: Gets the number of dimensions that the animation variable is to be animated in.
member.param: The number of dimensions.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetFinalIntegerValue
member.summary: Gets the final integer value of the animation variable. This is the value after all currently scheduled animations have completed.
member.param: The final value of the animation variable as an integer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetFinalIntegerVectorValue
member.summary: Gets the final integer value of the animation variable for the specified dimension. This is the value after all currently scheduled animations have completed.
member.param: The final value of the animation variable as an integer.
The dimension from which to get the value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetFinalValue
member.summary: Gets the final value of the animation variable. This is the value after all currently scheduled animations have completed.
member.param: The final value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetFinalVectorValue
member.summary: Gets the final value of the animation variable for the specified dimension. This is the value after all currently scheduled animations have completed.
member.param: The final value of the animation variable.
The dimension from which to get the value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetIntegerValue
member.summary: Gets the integer value of the animation variable.
member.param: The value of the animation variable as an integer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetIntegerVectorValue
member.summary: Gets the integer value of the animation variable for the specified dimension.
member.param: The value of the animation variable as an integer.
The dimension from which to get the value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetPreviousIntegerValue
member.summary: Gets the previous integer value of the animation variable in the specified dimension. This is the value of the animation variable before the most recent update.
member.param: The previous value of the animation variable as an integer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetPreviousIntegerVectorValue
member.summary: Gets the previous integer value of the animation variable for the specified dimension. This is the value of the animation variable before the most recent update.
member.param: The previous value of the animation variable as an integer.
The dimension from which to get the value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetPreviousValue
member.summary: Gets the previous value of the animation variable. This is the value of the animation variable before the most recent update.
member.param: The previous value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetPreviousVectorValue
member.summary: Gets the previous value of the animation variable for the specified dimension. This is the value of the animation variable before the most recent update.
member.param: The previous value of the animation variable.
The dimension from which to get the value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetTag
member.summary: Gets the tag of the animation variable.
member.param: The object portion of the tag.
The identifier portion of the tag.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the animation variable.
member.param: The value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetVectorCurve
member.summary: Gets the animation curve of the animation variable for the specified dimension.
member.param: The object that generates a sequence of animation curve primitives.
The number of animation curves.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.GetVectorValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the animation variable in the specified dimension.
member.param: The value of the animation variable.
The dimension from which to get the value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetLowerBound
member.summary: Sets the lower bound (floor) for the value of the animation variable. The value of the animation variable should not fall below the specified value.
member.param: The lower bound for the value of the animation variable.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetLowerBoundVector
member.summary: Sets the lower bound (floor) value of each specified dimension for the animation variable. The value of each animation variable should not fall below its lower bound.
member.param: A vector (of size cDimension) that contains the lower bound values of each dimension.
The number of dimensions that require lower bound values. This parameter specifies the number of values listed in bound.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetRoundingMode
member.summary: Sets the rounding mode of the animation variable.
member.param: The rounding mode.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetTag
member.summary: Sets the tag of the animation variable.
member.param: The object portion of the tag. This parameter can be NULL.
The identifier portion of the tag.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetUpperBound
member.summary: Sets the upper bound (ceiling) for the value of the animation variable. The value of the animation variable should not rise above the specified value.
member.param: The upper bound for the value of the animation variable.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetUpperBoundVector
member.summary: Sets the upper bound (ceiling) value of each specified dimension for the animation variable. The value of each animation variable should not rise above its upper bound.
member.param: A vector (of size cDimension) that contains the upper bound values of each dimension.
The number of dimensions that require upper bound values. This parameter specifies the number of values listed in bound.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetVariableChangeHandler
member.summary: Specifies a handler for changes to the value of the animation variable.
member.param: The handler for changes to the value of the animation variable. This parameter can be NULL.
If TRUE, specifies that the method will incorporate handler into its estimate of the time interval until the next animation event. No default value.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetVariableCurveChangeHandler
member.summary: Specifies a handler for changes to the animation curve of the animation variable.
member.param: A pointer to the handler for changes to the animation curve of the animation variable. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2.SetVariableIntegerChangeHandler
member.summary: Specifies a handler for changes to the integer value of the animation variable.
member.param: A pointer to the handler for changes to the integer value of the animation variable. This parameter can be NULL.
If TRUE, specifies that the method will incorporate handler into its estimate of the time interval until the next animation event. No default value.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable2
member.summary: Defines an animation variable, which represents a visual element that can be animated in multiple dimensions.
